title: The Great American cowboy
creator_credit: Walt Disney Educational Media Company and Keith Merrill
brief_description: An “in-the-arena” look at a rodeo that gives viewers a spectacular perspective of the life of today’s cowboys and follows the year-long championships quest of two competitors.
creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Educational Media Company and Keith Merrill
